Latest official version of JDemetra+ Graphical User Interface and Cruncher 3.5.1 was released on June 12th 2025 containing important bug corrections.

It can be found at

[https://github.com/jdemetra/jdplus-main/releases/tag/v3.5.1](https://github.com/jdemetra/jdplus-main/releases/tag/v3.5.1)


For installing instructions see [https://jdemetra-new-documentation.netlify.app/#installing-the-software](https://jdemetra-new-documentation.netlify.app/#installing-the-software)

A new release of rjd3toolkit, rjd3tramoseats, rjd3x13, rjd3sts, rjd3providers, rjd3workspace has also just been published

All rjdverse packages are available on GitHub (https://github.com/rjdverse) and on r-universe (https://rjdverse.r-universe.dev/packages)

Installation procedures are detailed in the readme files.
